rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Twitter 数据揭示了对 COVID-19 指南合规性的人口统计洞察《科学报告》中的一项研究分析了 Twitter 数据，以确定影响遵守 COVID-19 公共卫生指南的人口因素，揭示了不同群体之间社会流动性的显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Twitter-data-reveals-demographic-insights-into-COVID-19-guideline-compliance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Twitter-data-reveals-demographic-insights-into-COVID-19-guideline-compliance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b19c1eef-834d-420e-a3fa-166b2466cb12 Mon, 15 Jan 2024 20:02:00 -0500 Twitter data reveals demographic insights into COVID-19 guideline compliance
新研究表明偏头痛与炎症性肠病风险增加有关一项全国性队列研究表明，患有偏头痛的人患炎症性肠病 (IBD) 的风险高出 1.3 倍，这表明偏头痛和 IBD 之间存在显着联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Migraine-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lingual-bowel-disease-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Migraine-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lingual-bowel-disease-in-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a090e10c-36a8-457f-b37f-734cb70c13fa Mon, 15 Jan 2024 19:25:00 -0500 Migraine linked to increased risk of inflammatory bowel disease in new study
用于膀胱癌治疗的纳米机器人有望实现高效和靶向递送Nature Nanotechnology 上的一项研究揭示了脲酶驱动的纳米机器人增强膀胱癌治疗的潜力，显示使用放射性碘负载纳米机器人进行靶向治疗的小鼠模型中肿瘤减少了 90%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Nanobots-for-bladder-cancer-treatment-promising-high-efficacy-and-targeted-delivery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Nanobots-for-bladder-cancer-treatment-promising-high-efficacy-and-targeted-delivery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb914d6f-3e70-4bf3-afdd-32df279970cc Mon, 15 Jan 2024 18:50:00 -0500 Nanobots for bladder cancer treatment, promising high efficacy and targeted delivery
研究警告心脏病患者使用含有硝酸盐的 ED 药物会增加风险瑞典的一项研究表明，使用勃起功能障碍药物（PDE5 抑制剂）和硝酸盐药物治疗男性患心血管疾病的风险更高，可能会增加发病率和死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Study-warns-of-increased-risks-in-heart-病人-using-ED-drugs-with-硝酸盐.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Study-warns-of-increased-risks-in-heart-病人-using-ED-drugs-with-硝酸盐.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be19070e-6445-479e-a02a-a6020e5ba4bd Mon, 15 Jan 2024 17:51:00 -0500 Study warns of increased risks in heart patients using ED drugs with nitrates
Norstella 公司 Evaluate 宣布收购 J+D Forecasting J+D Forecasting 是制药行业预测解决方案的领先提供商，很高兴正式分享我们被 Norstella 家族杰出成员 Evaluate 收购的消息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Evaluate-a-Norstella-company-announces-acquisition-of-J2bD-Forecasting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Evaluate-a-Norstella-company-announces-acquisition-of-J2bD-Forecasting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9cb7923-a679-410b-8277-195f972bd8de Mon, 15 Jan 2024 10:06:00 -0500
研究发现减少铅暴露与改善心脏健康之间存在联系血铅水平下降与收缩压和舒张压变化之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Research-finds-connection- Between-reduced-lead-exposure-and-heart-health-improvements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Research-finds-connection- Between-reduced-lead-exposure-and-heart-health-improvements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acab9c18-755e-4841-bea2-4425ac7ebe76 Mon, 15 Jan 2024 10:06:00 -0500 Research finds connection between reduced lead exposure and heart health improvements
革命性的透明石墨烯微电极增强大脑成像和刺激从表面电位解码单细胞和平均神经活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Revolutionary-transparent-graphene-microelectrodes-enhance-brain-imaging-and-stimulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Revolutionary-transparent-graphene-microelectrodes-enhance-brain-imaging-and-stimulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31ec5013-b9af-48f7-9901-59a2de9f8235 Mon, 15 Jan 2024 09:34:00 -0500 Revolutionary transparent graphene microelectrodes enhance brain imaging and stimulation
万通帮助制药公司更新其 USP 方法https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Metrohm-helps-pharma-to-bring-their-USP-methods-up-to-date.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Metrohm-helps-pharma-to-bring-their-USP-methods-up-to-date.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5244c353-f9f8-4670-8c10-fa2a6f790ede Mon, 15 Jan 2024 08:41:00 -0500 Metrohm helps pharma to bring their USP methods up to date
开创性的基因组进展：采访 Illumina 的软件和信息学专家 Rami Mehio在本次采访中，Illumina 软件和信息学主管 Rami Mehio 分享了他对英国生物银行全基因组测序等重大基因组项目的经验和贡献。他讨论了基因组数据分析中的挑战和创新，强调了 Illumina 在推进基因研究和精准医学方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Pioneering-Genomic-Progress-An-Interview-with-Rami-Mehio-Illuminas-Software-and-Informatics-Expert.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Pioneering-Genomic-Progress-An-Interview-with-Rami-Mehio-Illuminas-Software-and-Informatics-Expert.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5d3e24c-b9a6-4fcf-9227-451b4c1cf4e9 Mon, 15 Jan 2024 08:40:00 -0500 Pioneering Genomic Progress: An Interview with Rami Mehio, Illumina's Software and Informatics Expert
研究发现，病毒载量较高的艾滋病毒人群的病毒重组率也较高研究人员调查了宿主内艾滋病毒人群的密度是否较高，同时感染和重组的发生率是否较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Study-finds-that-HIV-populations-in-people-with-higher-viral-loads-also-have-higher-rates-of-viral-重组.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Study-finds-that-HIV-populations-in-people-with-higher-viral-loads-also-have-higher-rates-of-viral-重组.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=985846fe-e1f7-4e3e-a0ee-77c5504ba3f6 Mon, 15 Jan 2024 08:11:00 -0500 Study finds that HIV populations in people with higher viral loads also have higher rates of viral recombination
